Your Source for NY Trail Information

Looking for a local trail to ride a bike? A mountain to hike?

We offer guides to upstate New York trails, with a primary focus on the Capital Region and southern Adirondacks. Listings contain trail descriptions, maps to trailheads, and photos. View our map to choose a trail, and be sure to let us know about trails you'd like to see featured here!

Wooded trail with several waterfall views

22-acre public space with trees from all over the world

Town park in Guilderland with several miles of nature trails
Bozen Kill Preserve
Easy nature trail hike in Altamont with waterfalls

A short hike to a nice view in Albany County
